overview: The blog is mainly dedicated to contents related to tablet PCs, smartphones, laptops and some creative mini gadgets. New tablet PC introduction and reviews are the highlights of this tech blog. What transforms our life to great extent may be those fast-developping gadgets. It is pleaure to keep track of all those new things which emerge out continually and bring us fresh experience. To frame those abstract experiences into words and then share them with others is something so pleasant.
